ai.title: AI Company Anthropic Releases Claude 3 Models, Claiming New Breakthrough
ai.content: Anthropic has unveiled its new Claude 3 AI models, claiming significant improvements in reasoning, accuracy, and capabilities compared to previous versions and competing models.
ai.chinese: 人工智能公司 Anthropic 发布 Claude 3 模型，声称取得新突破。该公司表示，新模型在推理能力、准确性和整体功能方面都有显著提升。

entertainment.title: Oscars 2024: 'Oppenheimer' Leads With 13 Academy Award Nominations
entertainment.content: Christopher Nolan's 'Oppenheimer' dominates the 96th Academy Awards nominations with 13 nods, including Best Picture and Best Director. The ceremony will be held on March 10.
entertainment.chinese: 2024年奥斯卡：《奥本海默》以13项提名领跑。克里斯托弗·诺兰执导的《奥本海默》在第96届奥斯卡奖提名中占据主导地位，包括最佳影片和最佳导演在内共获得13项提名。颁奖典礼将于3月10日举行。

finance.title: Japan's Nikkei Hits Record High, Surpassing 1989 Peak
finance.content: Japan's Nikkei stock index has reached a new all-time high, surpassing its previous record set in 1989, driven by corporate reforms and strong market performance.
finance.chinese: 日本日经指数创历史新高，超越1989年峰值。在企业改革和强劲市场表现的推动下，日本股市达到了新的历史高点。

politics.title: UN Court Orders Israel to Take Steps to Prevent and Punish Genocide Incitement
politics.content: The International Court of Justice has ordered Israel to take immediate measures to prevent and punish acts of genocide incitement in Gaza, adding new legal pressure on Israel.
politics.chinese: 联合国法院命令以色列采取措施防止和惩治煽动种族灭绝行为。国际法院要求以色列立即采取措施，防止和惩治在加沙地区煽动种族灭绝的行为，这给以色列增加了新的法律压力。
